statements: SELECT * FROM demographic_data;
SELECT region_name, population_size FROM demographic_data;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE political_opinion = 'Liberal';
SELECT region_id, region_name, population_size FROM demographic_data ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT region_name, political_opinion FROM demographic_data WHERE population_size > 100000;
SELECT region_name, population_size FROM demographic_data WHERE population_size > 100000 ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE political_opinion = 'Conservative' AND population_size > 50000 ORDER BY population_size ASC, region_name ASC;
SELECT region_name, political_opinion FROM demographic_data WHERE political_opinion IS NOT NULL ORDER BY political_opinion ASC;
SELECT region_name, population_size, political_opinion FROM demographic_data WHERE population_size < 50000 OR political_opinion = 'Liberal' ORDER BY region_name ASC, population_size DESC;
SELECT region_name, political_opinion FROM demographic_data WHERE population_size BETWEEN 50000 AND 200000 ORDER BY region_name DESC, political_opinion ASC;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT id, age, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT region, age, gender FROM demographic_data ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT region, gender, political_opinion FROM demographic_data WHERE region='Europe'
SELECT political_opinion, AVG(opinion_count) FROM opinion_distribution GROUP BY political_opinion
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT region, age, political_opinion FROM demographic_data ORDER BY region ASC, age DESC;
SELECT region, AVG(age) AS avg_age, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM demographic_data GROUP BY region HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT dd.region, od.political_opinion, SUM(od.opinion_count) AS total_opinion_count FROM demographic_data dd JOIN opinion_distribution od ON dd.region = od.region GROUP BY dd.region, od.political_opinion;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS gender_count FROM demographic_data GROUP BY gender HAVING gender_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT region_name, population FROM demographics WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT region_name, median_age FROM demographics ORDER BY median_age DESC;
SELECT region_name, political_opinion, approval_rating FROM demographics JOIN political_opinions ON demographics.region_id = political_opinions.region_id;
SELECT region_name, avg_approval_rating FROM demographics JOIN region_stats ON demographics.region_id = region_stats.region_id;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY median_age DESC;
SELECT region_name, population FROM demographics WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%' AND median_age < 40;
SELECT region_name, political_opinion FROM demographics JOIN political_opinions ON demographics.region_id = political_opinions.region_id WHERE approval_rating > 50 ORDER BY region_name ASC;

SELECT region_name, population, avg_approval_rating FROM demographics JOIN region_stats ON demographics.region_id = region_stats.region_id WHERE num_polls >= 5 AND avg_approval_rating < 70 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT region_name, median_age FROM demographics WHERE region_name IN ('North', 'South', 'East') AND median_age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT region, age_group, gender FROM demographics;
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT region_name, average_income FROM regions ORDER BY average_income DESC;
SELECT name, political_party FROM politicians WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT region, age_group, gender FROM demographics WHERE age_group = '18-25' ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE population > 500000 ORDER BY average_income DESC;
SELECT opinion_text, political_affiliation FROM opinions WHERE political_affiliation = 'Liberal' AND region_id = 2 ORDER BY opinion_id DESC;
SELECT politician_id, name, political_party FROM politicians WHERE region_id = 5 AND political_party = 'Democratic' ORDER BY name;

SELECT d.region, p.name, o.opinion_text FROM demographics d JOIN politicians p ON d.id = p.region_id JOIN opinions o ON d.region = o.region_id WHERE d.gender = 'Male' ORDER BY p.name DESC, o.opinion_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM citizens;
SELECT region_name, population FROM regions WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT party_name, ideology FROM political_parties WHERE ideology = 'Liberal';
SELECT poll_date, opinion FROM opinion_polls ORDER BY poll_date DESC;
SELECT citizen_id, age, gender, party_affiliation FROM citizens WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, population FROM regions WHERE population BETWEEN 50000 AND 200000 ORDER BY population ASC;
SELECT party_name, ideology FROM political_parties WHERE party_name LIKE 'A%' OR ideology LIKE '%democracy%' ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT c.citizen_id, c.age, c.gender, p.party_name FROM citizens c JOIN political_parties p ON c.party_affiliation = p.party_name WHERE c.age > 30 ORDER BY c.age DESC;
SELECT pr.poll_id, pp.party_name, pr.vote FROM poll_results pr JOIN political_parties pp ON pr.party_id = pp.party_id WHERE pr.vote = 'Yes' OR pr.vote = 'No' ORDER BY pr.poll_id ASC;
